title: UUID Generator
aboutDescription: A UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a 128-bit number used to uniquely identify information in computer systems. The probability of generating duplicate UUIDs is negligibly small.

sections.title: UUID Format
content: Structure: time-low, time-mid, time-hi-version, clock-seq, node

sections.title: UUID Version 4
content: This tool generates Version 4 UUIDs, which are randomly generated. The 4 most significant bits of the 7th byte are set to 0100 (version 4), and the 2-3 most significant bits of the 9th byte are set to 10 (variant 1).
